TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_MayawKilang, title = MayawKilang, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/MayawKilang} }

S.FORM: u niyazu' nu Sakul , tatama a tademaw. mikawaw i pu'ukwan. miyenkyu to tademaw i 'ayaw. tusa a wawa (tutuy), u acawana ci Valis, u Bunun cingra'.
o niyazo' no Sakol , tatama a tademaw. mikawaw i po'okwan. miyenkyo to tademaw i 'ayaw. tosa a wawa (totoy), o acawana ci Valis, o Bonon cingra'.
